## Response to Treatment according to Receptor Status

```{r}
augment_data %>%
  count(receptor_group, response) %>%
  group_by(receptor_group) %>%
  mutate(percent = n / sum(n) * 100) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = receptor_group, y = percent, fill = response)) +
  geom_col(position = "stack") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Response to Treatment according to Receptor Status",
       x = "Receptors",
       y = "Percent",
       fill = "Response")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5))

```
